website_summaries.verdict: The night vision on this bullet camera is clearer and farther than others.
pros: Night vision uses IR LED lights to be able to give you a night vision for 180'
Handles all kinds of weather including cold temperatures and wet conditions
Good low light images in addition to night vision
cons: This is not a wireless system

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price. Significant upgrade to old analog DVR Security system.
customer_reviews.text: Very good image for the price. Better than camera that cost 4x as much. (See Pics. They say it all.) Also a wider range of view than other 2.8mm cameras. More detail in the image. Handles lighting much better. See at least 100' with the built in LEDs. Works well with aux. lighting as well. Only downside is no way to flip the image. (Old cameras had a menu that the image could be flipped or mirrored, this camera does not have any of that.)
customer_reviews.author: Stickman

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but the housing and mount is extremely bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: The cameras have good pictures but they are so cheaply made it feels like they were put into a beer can as a casing. Hard to adjust the mount without it falling apart constantly. Extremely horrible quality and then when they go into night vision mode and turn to black and white you hear a big click I seriously doubt these cameras will work in the Alaskan winter very bad quality. My other cameras that came with my A-zone system probably don't have quite as good a picture but at least they feel like they're built to last these other things feel like a big beer can very flimsy extremely bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Results
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 and all seemed good at first. I was pleased by the color and night vision. Then after a rain I noticed that one had water in the housing (within about 3 weeks of installation). Though the camera itself still functioned somewhat - there were lines running across the image - the night vision had failed. Amazon accepted a return and we'll see how the replacement holds up. I've kept the rating high (4 stars) because the I do like the 2 that are still functioning.
customer_reviews.author: MAW

customer_reviews.title: Could be better for night Vision.  Low quality hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Beware that this model ONLY has 28 IR LEDs. It does a poor job at night. 48 IR LEDs are much better which should be the absolute min on a camera. Also, the rotating knobs in the back are terrible as the camera ages so does the plastic. I purchased 4 of them and they are all missing their focus/zoom knobs. They stick out of the body of the camera and start degrading. If you try to rotate them they snap right off because the plastic is too brittle. You can no longer correct the focus or the zoom. Allen heads style adjustment knobs are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they sell this particular camera any more. The new one that replaced it, worst camera I have ever bought...And yes I returned it. You can tell if its the updated camera- It does not have the focus or zoom on the rear of the camera. The one that sucks has the adjustments under the camera and you have to use a hex key to adjust..Which also sucks. Look at my feedback for that particular camera.
customer_reviews.author: TrumpsAjoke

customer_reviews.title: not clear at all
customer_reviews.text: I used this camera for about an year and I kept trying to adjust the settings every so often. I did a little more research and found this camera was set to 960H which is lower than 720p. The day time was cloudy and not crisp. The night vision did not go 180 feet as claim. I see the product is unavailable and this is probably why.
customer_reviews.author: Mas

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: first camera quit after few months and they replaced it with a use one. After a month it started cutting on and off. Replaced feed cable and power tried different monitor with same results. I gave up and decided not to try another used one. Update....camera has quit all together....stay clear of these....if you buy new then the replacement should be new.....
customer_reviews.author: Dennis N Merrick Sr

customer_reviews.title: This is the "best buy" in 1000tvl CCTV cameras
customer_reviews.text: I have recently purchased 8 of these cameras for use at 3/different clients buildings. All worked out of the box, were simple to focus, adjust and install. The housing is substantial for outdoor application. I have mounted these indoors as well, where application was appropriate. Several of these are connected to 200' of RG59u Siamese between camera and DVR, without loss of quality. I like them. The IR is excellent for night time illumination. The day time image is excellent. This camera rates a "best buy" from me, as it is selling on Amazon at a good price. ($69. or less)
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Average CCTV Camera, Better Ones Out There
customer_reviews.text: These work acceptable but are not 1080P resolution; more like 960. The color image quality is slightly above average during the day, and a little worse in black-and-white during the night. It is what it is and you will pay more for better image quality like 4 or 5 mega pixel cams. I bought the dome camera version of this same brand (RVD70) and its image quality was noticeably less than this bullet cam.
customer_reviews.author: EWT

customer_reviews.title: Great cam, especially for price and great wide angle view
customer_reviews.text: Installed camera, a few weeks ago and thus far very impressed... Of all the cams I've bought, this is the most impressive... I have the QSee 8 cam setup, in a little under 2 years my system has held up as well as could be expected, but had to replace a few cams, this Best Vision BV-IR140 is the clearest and best with a wide angle view. 5 stars easy. I've paid more for others but quality of picture not as good and again it's wide angle is great. Night vision work perfect. Bare in mind, I have an analog system but certainly adequate for my home needs.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these the range is outstanding . But it's so blurry don't know if I got a bad one or what the Tech told me 50ft of cable was the most it would handle . That being the case I'm boxing it up and sending it back not the camera for me min. cable length I can run is 65ft. Too bad I really liked it ..
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit of a pain to focus, but holy cow this is a good camera at this price. I am using it to replace a single camera in my 8 camera home system because I wanted to zoom in a little higher on the camera view. It was a simple plug and play operation. An added bonus is the long range of this camera at night. I puts the other cameras in my system to shame. Have no fear about getting this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Car Guy

customer_reviews.title: 1000TVL Cameras with External Adjusment and Excellent resolution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cameras with external zoom and focus adjustment. Huge improvement over my old 700TVL cameras. The lens cover a wider area than the smaller cameras with 3.6mm lens, thus reducing blind spots. Resolution is excellent, I can actually see the backyard lawn grass blades on my monitor. Night vision is outstanding with good long range making night time seem like day time. Finally, the price of this camera is very competitive with others with fewer features. I've started to replace my old cameras with this one. We shall see long term reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Rob V

customer_reviews.title: Much better picture than the $20-$35 range cams
customer_reviews.text: Much better picture than the $20-$35 range cams. Cleaner pic day and night, but the IR is a little spot lightish if you are you are using at 2.8mm. This camera is heavier than most, bigger than most and more sturdy than most. The neck adjustments are good and will hold and not weaken and blow around in the wind like some of the cheaper cams. Also, the 4 hole mounting makes for a solid mounting connection.
customer_reviews.author: After10LV

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy more if it holds up for a while. Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The night vision is spectacular! It really lights up a large area and has great clarity. The daytime monitoring is also very good. I like being able to zoom to an area that I want to monitor. It's a manual zoom so don't buy it if you want to electronically control the zoom. I like it after 3 days and will buy some more if it holds up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: SocratesinLove

customer_reviews.title: Great 600 - 1000 line security camera replacement for old DVRs.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 600 line camera failure before I was going on a trip. I ordered this R-Tech camera because of all the different video transmissions. With the default camera settings the DVR recorded the camera output. I had a another good experience with the zoom and focus features and have a better picture of the area I need recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Never_Read

customer_reviews.title: the camera is bigger than i had thought but was fine and being snow white a bit hard to conceal
customer_reviews.text: impressed with the quality system, the camera is bigger than i had thought but was fine and being snow white a bit hard to conceal, so nothing new here.
customer_reviews.author: skagman

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of cameras from Amazon so I bought two of these cameras after reading the reviews I don't know if I got a set of two that were bad but there is no way to focus these things. Impressed by the size but the quality is just not there. Focusing is one issue but the real bad issue is night vision not impressed. So buyer beware. This is a truly honest review sorry guys just a bad product too bad
customer_reviews.author: william flynn

customer_reviews.title: Very good view day and night easy to focus long range ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good view day and night easy to focus long range wide angle very low price I will replace all my old cameras I recommend you to do the same
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto E.

customer_reviews.title: R-Tech CA-IR140-HD 1000TVL Outdoor Bullet
customer_reviews.text: These camera's are great for the price. I have 5 of them and the picture is great and has great coverage. Night vision is outstanding. Upgrading the old night owl camera's with these and these are 100 times better than the ones I replaced. For the money you cant beat them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Very clear night picture
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture. LED illumination is very even at night. Night time picture is better than my old camera's daytime picture. Of course, the daytime picture is very clear and detailed. The zoom and focus are a little touchy - a little adjustment makes a big difference. The camera is a little larger than most bullet cameras. Maybe that is a good thing - it will get noticed.Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Great night vision
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these, I liked the first one so much I replaced another camera for the wider angle view, but also like the better night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Dick McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for Home Monitoring
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera. It isn't Night Vision Capable though. With a light left on, it is fully capable of capturing very clear video. I'm satisfied with these cameras and think you will be also.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Excelent low kight clarity!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome resolution especially good at lowlight conditions. It blows all my other cameras away! I'd replace them all with this if I had the extra money to spend.
customer_reviews.author: dincon2000

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: A good product, durable after a year outdoor use, no problem. Video quality is limited only to the DVR you used, in general good.
customer_reviews.author: ACW1120

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is awesome , I added 2 of these to a system that had 10 of another brand - the customer said that these are far better than the ones they had ......... they are happy and so am I . Shipping was fast , product is great and I will be back for more !
customer_reviews.author: Guy Beeckman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!! I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: First off- This does not come with a power supply. However, it does come with great resolution, great low light sensitively, and clear image when focused. I am very happy with this camera and depending on longevity I will be replacing other cameras with this one. The differance between thhis camera and other High Res Cameras is amazing. To aim/zoom/focus it in I was able to use a generic dvr viewer app on my Android called SuperLive. It was cake!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy install - good night vision and sharp day lite picture. Quality material makes this a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Elge S. Spalding

customer_reviews.title: I have a 650+ pounds back bear I video wish I knew how to share
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera it's like having a light on all the time and the zoom works great I will be buying some more ok it's been some time I bought this back in May still the best camera I have well spent money now I'm thinking of getting more or putting in a piz cameras just so I can move it or follow something
customer_reviews.author: wilddeer

customer_reviews.title: NOT good, at best average
customer_reviews.text: NOT good, at best average. Night vision is OK nothing to write home about. Old school. The cord is very short so had to get an extension. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Video camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Quality is good, not great. Fair night time video. The focus is very touchy to get set properly. Seems built well,
customer_reviews.author: K4HOC

customer_reviews.title: Low quality picture
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is low quality just making larger pixels. The non zoom cameras work much better and cost less. I can just zoom the Image and it’s much clearer on regular cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Zehr

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable camera with easily twice as clear day or night than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable camera with easily twice as clear day or night than my old Q-See cameras. I did upgrade the power source just in case as I imagine it pulls more power due to the additional infrared led power. I also love the manual zoom and focus as we had a few specific areas to monitor that were out of range before, but now they are clear as day!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Best night vision out of the 10 cameras I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased more than 10 different cameras and this one is the best. The IR LEDs are larger & brighter and the angle can be set to be very wide and adjusted with external thumb screws. The quality is better than some cameras I paid more than $120 for. Using this to record a 24 ft X 24 ft patio area and the night vision is fantastic for this footage. I'll likely be replacing some of my more expensive cameras with this one.
customer_reviews.author: no comment

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these cameras based on the reviews and pictures provided by other purchasers. However, they do these cameras no justice! The field of view and picture quality is amazing! I have a couple other 1000tvl cameras from another company and they look like pictures from an old flip phone compared to these! These cameras are quite big, although not cheaply made at all! The night vision is great!! I would definitely recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Works for Home applications and some business applications
customer_reviews.text: Not much better than a 4 year old sd camera I have but it’s $44 so I’ll take it. It’s channel 8 in the picture on a hd dvr the other cameras are expensive sd cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as well if not better than my high end cameras. Easier to set up too. Great picture. AC adapter is SOLD SEPARATELY and well as the camera wire.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera. Little quirky in getting it focused and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Little quirky in getting it focused and although the night vision is great, it is not as clear as some other cameras I have. See attached picture for a comparison ( Best Vision on Left, An off brand which I have had for 4 years on the right). Have bought 6 Best Vision cameras so far, so can't be bad.
customer_reviews.author: noslenlsn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It's a replacement for one of the original cameras that came with our security system...it's 10 times better than the original cameras... the images are bright and much sharper!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Winczewski

customer_reviews.title: This one is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 ZOSI cameras and they don't last say they are water proof but don't believe it they are poor quality and you'll be disappointed. This camera has been through pouring rain, hail and anything you can throw at it you will be very satisfied. You can take that to the bank. Nolan
customer_reviews.author: Nolan R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera on older analog video recorders and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Y.

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I had a learning curve doing the zoom and focus but it does exactly what I wanted. I actually bought 2. I did the wide angle on one to cover my pool at home and long range here at the storage units that I manage. When I have to replace any of the 22 cameras here at the storage, it will be with this camera, because of the zoom capability
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, bulky and highly noticeable. That can be a good deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Running for a few weeks now. Awesome. Would buy again, Delivered on time. Excellent video quality. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Wide field of view. Wish it came in different color (brown) to match my house color. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: James Wacaster

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera. It is bigger than some so make ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It is bigger than some so make sure you read the dimensions before buying. I like the zoom and focus adjustments. They also you to get just the field of view your looking for. I wanted to get just the area around my mailbox and this does it. The picture quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Focus is a bit touching and depth of field is ...
customer_reviews.text: Focus is a bit touching and depth of field is very narrow in anything other that full sunlight. Hard to believe these are 1000TVL. I don't get that.
customer_reviews.author: Starlyter

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: bought 3 of these and so far so good. Video quality is very good, how they hold up to weather and how the LED's hold up is yet to be seen.. It was a good buy at the original price, but I wouldn't say they are so good I would pay $80.00 each . For $10 more I could go digital at 3mp
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to replace a 960h qsee camera that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 960h qsee camera that stopped working. I was pleasantly suprised at how crisp the picture was. I now plan on trying to replace all my cameras. My only complaint is this camera is alot bigger then my other cameras. I didn't expect it to be that big.
customer_reviews.author: D Driesen

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect real good quality picture at this price, but did expect it to last a while. Went completely out 1 day after return date box expired. Won't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived today. Removed old camera and mounted this ...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. Removed old camera and mounted this one under front porch looking at front door about 20 feet away. Tried to adjust zoom so I could see faces of people at door. could not get it focused. Looked all over internet for user manual. apparently there is not one. Today being saturday customer service is closed. Had to put old camera back up. No instructions came with camera for adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's my fav of several camera's. It's a larger and heavier than many out there and the mounting base is larger. Take into consideration when buying. You will need a friend to fine tune while you watch the monitor. I can see the entire parking lot of our complex night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Disco in Myrtle Beach

customer_reviews.title: Day image very good, night vision better
customer_reviews.text: The day image quality very good. Nigh vision is much better comparing to my old cameras. In order to get the 1000TVL you need a Dvr to support TVL cameras otherwise it will be the dvr recording resolution which will be D1 (700 x 480 NTCS)
customer_reviews.author: SKA (IL USA)

customer_reviews.title: Very clear pictures in a wide verity of weather conditions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install Very clear pictures Works with very little adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Ljmassman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: With this camera it's daylight all night :) I have cameras that cost hundreds of dollars that don't give me this vision at night. Couldn't be happier with purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best picture but well worth the price. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: marion broussard

customer_reviews.title: I expected a little better
customer_reviews.text: I expected a little better, but for the price it is a good camera. Finicky to get focused when zoomed in. Hard to get a clear shot of licence plates.
customer_reviews.author: SWarfRat

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, not LPR
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Good focus and good zoom. Adequate night vision. Just did not work as a replacement license plate recognition camera.
customer_reviews.author: LMRud

customer_reviews.title: Superior night vison.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different replacements when my original bullet cameras started pooping out on me. This one by far has the superior night vision. Camera is bigger than your standard camera, but the picture quality is so much better. Manual zoom and focus. Once you get it dialed in, it's golden.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Night vision
customer_reviews.text: In the daytime it has a great picture at night not very good. I really would like to have some information on the adjustment knobs in the back
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Possibly failed after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Alot bigger than 'standard' bullet cameras Ive used. Bigger lens allows color mode alot longer before switching to night mode. Picture is much clearer than other cameras, but with zoom set to widest field of view, the image is quite fish eyed making straight lines look curved. Bought 3 installed 2. 1 appears to have completely failed in 6 months. Havent replaced to verify failure not due to wiring, but I did verify power supply was working properly. Will try to remember to update this review when I get up the nerve to climb 25ft up a ladder to check/replace.
customer_reviews.author: R. Done

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price sturdy and seems well built
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price sturdy and seems well built. The night vision range is awesome day time brightness had to be adjusted down and saturation. But wow very impressed with this item so far.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Turns off when sun heats it!
customer_reviews.text: When afternoon sun hits camera, it shuts off until dusk. Temps have been in the mid 90s and Denver humidity is low. I will have to move it to the East side of my house. This thing has a huge enclosure by the way. I would not purchase again because of the temp cut-out issue. Optical and night vision seem fine. Just past my 30 days so I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: L McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Wider view than original, better optics, more Infrared LEDs for better night viewing.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Wider view than original, better optics, more Infrared LEDs for better night viewing.
customer_reviews.author: AMPotter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works well, day or night. If I need another this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark CA

customer_reviews.title: Huge camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is huge.... see the difference in size... so if you are looking for a less noticeable camera this one is not the one. It does provide good picture day/night.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge & Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: These are great cameras with an awesome infrared that covers a great ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great cameras with an awesome infrared that covers a great distance for night vision. Good resolutions and color. I have gone through many different cameras in my home and office. By far these are the better product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from Swann cameras
customer_reviews.text: Have a swann system and after a year the cameras were showing purple tint during day. Replaced with this camera. It is about twice the size of the swanns. Also show a wider view than the swanns and have more IR leds and it is a much brighter picture at night. Looks like day! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Utah

customer_reviews.title: No Image
customer_reviews.text: Camera was larger in size than I expected, but what makes it worse is that it did not display an image even though the power was working and all cables probably connected
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera,,it was what I needed and the cost was good because I am disable
customer_reviews.author: julice1952

customer_reviews.title: First one great second camera faulty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased first one it works great especially night vision. So ordered a second camera I will be returning it focus knob to hard to turn by hand had to use a pliers and night vision not as good as the first one. Will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, great resolution, best night vision and distance for analog systems if you can handle the size. I have purchased 6 of these units with only one defective which seller exchanged no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Davidavich

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. Awesome price for this quality of camera. I have installed cameras over the years for many retailers. I was impressed by the quality of the infrared and how far it picks up. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great minus with one issue
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Only issue I had was the camera housing wasnt screwed together all the way from the factory and moisture got into the camera. I had to unscrew the housing completely, let it dry. And use automotive RTV sealant to keep the water out and since then Ita been working no problem and without leaks. One of the best cameras I have up on the house minus the water issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ross K

customer_reviews.title: Big solid camera
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 3 months so far works great! Sharper then most cameras with the same specs. Night vison is amazing! Works really good. Only thing bad I would say about it is it is HUGE
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Slam dunk
customer_reviews.text: These cameras were MUCH clearer and brighter than the stock cameras that came with my Samsung system. They were a direct replacement with the same cable connections. Happy happy joy joy.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan D.

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay in color mode, even in full daylight. Image quality is poor and manually focusing the lense is aggravating due to it's sensitivity. Finding that sweet spot is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Good Zoom Feature.
customer_reviews.text: The zoom feature is nice, however the picture quality is not much better than my 800 TV lines of resolution from my Zosi camera at one third the price. Rain tends to stick to the lens and distort the image.
customer_reviews.author: drednot

customer_reviews.title: it has a very bad picture at night
customer_reviews.text: This camera is in total darkness at night. It doesn't work very well at night, it has a very streaky, bad picture at night. My $30.00 camera works better.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Like many night vision cameras
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these work very well. Like many night vision cameras, they work only So-So at night, but they do work. Great resolution, easy to adjust and well made.
customer_reviews.author: fn-pauly

customer_reviews.title: This camera is definitely noticeable quality is good
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a pretty good picture it has two film about 35 feet away and it does zoom in looks great
customer_reviews.author: redbmw45

customer_reviews.title: Better than what i was expecting
customer_reviews.text: My old 2.8 mm lens camera did not even come close to this one. The wide angle is so much better and the night vision is awsome looks just like day time (just in black and white). I will be replacing the rest of my cameras with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tat2dmoto

customer_reviews.title: Great item. would buy again with my eyes closed
customer_reviews.text: Great item. would buy again with my eyes closed. If you haven't buy one, then you should.. great price too
customer_reviews.author: JGTop Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: The customer was very happy with the camera and was surprised to find out ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased for resale. The customer was very happy with the camera and was surprised to find out he could see images in the dark better with the camera than he could his naked eye.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Webber

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Probly one of THE best cameras you can get for the money. My first one came in with cracked lens but was replaced, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It was a little larger than I expected, but it works great. The picture quality is clear and bright it was also easy to adjust for viewing angle and focus. I have now had it up and running for about six months and will be ordering a few more of these to complete my hd surveillance system.
customer_reviews.author: R Dierks

customer_reviews.title: excellent product. video quality is much better than I ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. video quality is much better than I expected on my large screen TV. Focus adjustment is a little touchy but very convenient. product/case Seems to be built very well. Only thing I like to see is some type of optional mount to adjust Azimuth angle.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera! Love the wide angle and clear image
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! Love the wide angle and clear image. This camera replaced 2 cameras I had in my entry way. Seems to be high quality and shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Was good for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 8 months, then died. Works but picture is so fuzzy it’s not usable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Raffe

customer_reviews.title: JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: purchased 2 in late Nov.2017, within 2 weeks one stopped working, 2nd one doesn't work on night vision 3 weeks ago, waste of good money, never again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well made camera, priced right. Not sure if it is really 1000 TVL though, looks the same as the 700 TVL cameras I already have. Has been working great for a few months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF NOT IP66
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cameras for outdoor use because of the advertised IP66 rating. The 3 cameras that were installed externally all are filled with rain water. The camera shows well but they are not designed for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: Camera came as described and clarity among with colors are great. I can see a lot further and have a wider view than the previous camera I had installed. I plan on upgrading the other 3 cameras soon with this model.
customer_reviews.author: James Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price, works great will be buying some more
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best Vision BV-IR140-HD 1000TVL Bullet
customer_reviews.text: Best Vision BV-IR140-HD 1000TVL Bullet.. I have 5 cameras this one is the best one, the Quality is perfect the night vision is great i'm thinking about buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: del

customer_reviews.title: A very good camera at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: After I had a boat stolen from my yard, I needed a better camera with greater field of view and better distance at night this camera fit the need and works very good!
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The Best i ever owned wide and great loung range 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: The Best i ever owned wide and great loung range 2 bloocks i can still see a car turning an type of car Great THE BEST I want more
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: blows away night owl cameras
customer_reviews.text: I have a night owl system tried this one camera and it blows away there best camera the cam- 930 that I have been using. I will replace all my night owl cameras with more of these
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3-4 times bigger than expected zoom and focus works great excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: 3-4 times bigger than expected zoom and focus works great excellent picture. I will get it installed later tonight. High definition is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Glyn E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: BIG MISTAKE! This Camera Will-Not Properly Zoom nor Focus. I have Setup Countless Cameras and This BV-IR140 HD is Not 1000 TVL Lines / The Manufacturer Refuses To Honor a Replacement and is Difficult to make Contact * Avoid This Camera * Save Yourself Headaches
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo Martino

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I bought 3 other so-called 1200tvl cameras for less than $25 each and none of them match this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dino F

product_meta.title: R-Tech CA-IR140-HD 4-in-1 AHD/CVI/TVI/Analog Outdoor Bullet Security Camera IR LEDs for Night Vision - 2.8-12mm Varifocal
product_meta.description:
This is an outdoor professional level security camera with 1000 TV lines of resolution and a 2.8-12mm lens. The camera requires at least a 1 amp power supply and BNC cabling to operate (sold separately). A DVR or computer equipped with a video capture card is required to record video. Having any problems? Please call 1-866-514-8998 Mon-Fri, 9:00am-5:30pm CST to reach one of our helpful surveillance experts!,

Camera Specifications
Signal System: NTSC
Image Sensor: 1/3" Sensor
Effective Pixels(HxV): 1296 x 1041
S/N Ratio: > 48dB
DNR: 3D DNR
Mirror: Yes
OSD: No
Motion Detect: 4 areas optional
Privacy Zone: 8 areas optional
Scanning System: 2:1
Electronic Shutter: Auto (1/60s~1/100,000s)
Minimum Illumination: 0 Lux (with IR LED ON) / F1.8/ 50IRE
Sync System: Internal
Lens: 2.8-12mm
Gamma Characteristic: .45
IR Distance: 164ft (with 36 Unit Infrared LED)
IR Status: Under 10 Lux by CDS
IR Power On: CDS Auto Control
Video Output: 1Vpp, 75 Ohm
Power Consumption: 12VDC(+/-10%)/500mA
Water Resistance: IP66
Dimensions (W x H x D): 10.4" x 4.7" x 3.7"
Weight: 1.9 lbs
Operating Temperature: 14 ºF ~ 122 ºF (-10ºC ~ 50ºC)
Storage Temperature: -22 ºF ~ 140 ºF (-30ºC ~ 60ºC)
feature_bullets: Supports (4) HD video outputs: 1080P AHD, 1080P HD-CVI, 1080P HD-TVI, and 1200TVL Analog/ CVBS
Cable controller with switches for selecting video mode
2MP (1920x1080) high resolution CMOS sensor with high-intensity IR LEDs for night vision
2. 8-12Mm Varifocal (manually adjustable) lens for crystal clear focus
IP66 outdoor weatherproof rating with sturdy metal construction
